page.title: 12Ashbourne Fair.
page.content: The fair comes at{Easter and carnival week and there are lots of rides.Like the dodgems,bigwheel,waltzer, a train for little children and a roundabout. There are some other things to do like a boucing castle,darts game,arcade and rifle shooting.There's also a lot of sounds like generators,people shouting,music and the sound of rides. There are quite a lot of smells like hotdogs,drinks,candyfloss and popcorn. Some rides are only ten pence a go. The arcade has got some fruit machines and a space invader machine.Also in the arcade is a car game. When you're playing it you have to steer the red or the white car and it only costs ten pence.When the fair comes it goes onto the field next to the park and lots of people enjoy it.
